CustomField.formula:
IF(ispickval(Reason_for_Request__c,"NRComp"),"Mgr Discretion", IF(ispickval(Reason_for_Request__c,"Requesting Xactly Access"), "Requesting Xactly Access", IF(ispickval(Reason_for_Request__c,"Quota Change"), "Quota Change", IF(ispickval(Reason_for_Request__c,"SIP Team Admin Ticket"), "SIP Team Admin Ticket",
CASE(Ticket_Category_Selection__c, "Auto Closed","Auto Closed", "Mgr Discretion","Mgr Discretion", "Education Issue","Education Issue", "Finance Reporting Issue","Finance Reporting Issue", "Org Movement","Org Movement", "Xactly Issue","Xactly Issue", "SFDC Issue","SFDC Issue", "SAP or Spiral Issue","SAP or Spiral Issue", "SFDC Issue: RMU Specific","SFDC Issue: RMU Specific", "Attainment Issue","Attainment Issue", "SPIFF","SPIFF", "Unknown")))))
CustomField.label: Ticket Categories
